# GitHub Repository Setup Guide

## Repository Description

Use this description for your GitHub repository:

```
Official CLI tool for AY Claude Platform - Discover, install, and manage Claude Skills, Agents, Commands, Hooks, Plugins, MCPs, and Settings. Cross-platform package manager for Claude Code extensions.
```

## Repository Topics/Tags

Add these topics to improve discoverability:

```
claude
claude-ai
anthropic
claude-code
cli
package-manager
npm-package
typescript
nodejs
mcp
model-context-protocol
ai-tools
developer-tools
automation
extensions
marketplace
```

## Website URL (Optional)

If you have a website for the platform:
```
https://ay-claude.com
```

## How to Update Repository Settings

1. Go to your repository: https://github.com/walidboulanouar/ay-claude-templates
2. Click the **"Settings"** tab (or the gear icon next to "About")
3. Scroll down to the **"About"** section
4. Add the description in the description field
5. Add topics by clicking "Add topics" and entering the tags above
6. Add website URL if available
7. Click **"Save changes"**

## Repository Badges (Already in README)

The README already includes:
- npm version badge
- MIT License badge

These will display automatically once the repository is properly configured.
